meanings.definition: The process of shedding or peeling off scales or layers of skin.
meanings.sent1: After his sunburn, the desquamations of his skin were visible.
meanings.sent2: Regular exfoliation helps in the natural desquamations of the skin.
meanings.sent3: The lizard's desquamations were so frequent, it looked like it was changing outfits daily.
meanings.sent4: The old paint on the house was like the desquamations of a snake, revealing the fresh layer underneath.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained that desquamations are a normal part of the skin's renewal process.

meanings.sent2: Regular cleansing helps in the desquamations of dead skin cells.
meanings.sent3: The spa offered a special treatment for luxurious desquamations.
